title: Jcearnest93
author: Jcearnest93
content: I'm developing a new course for etoro. I need 2 beta testers to try out my trading method for etoro.My requirements are you must be a citizen of the USA, at least 18 years old and have a bank account. I will provide a full in depth step by step video training method for you to follow. Once you complete the training course, I will then provide you a $250 deposit for etoro to start off with.All I ask for in return is for to be willing to provide a video testimonial and show your results as proof that you have made money from my method. I'm not asking for any money from you, so please don't give me any shit. Just come with an open mind, be able to follow the simple instructions I give you and be willing to work fast. So if you're interested. DM or add me on telegram - @cearnest93
